mapper.insert: INSERT INTO school_work_db.teacher_info (ti_di_seq, ti_number, ti_name, ti_birth, ti_pwd, ti_phone_num, ti_email, ti_status) VALUES (#{ti_di_seq}, #{ti_number}, #{ti_name}, #{ti_birth}, #{ti_pwd}, #{ti_phone_num}, #{ti_email}, #{ti_status})
mapper.select: select count(*) from teacher_info where ti_seq = #{seq}

select ti_seq, ti_di_seq, ti_number, ti_name, ti_birth, ti_phone_num, ti_email, ti_status, di_name as department_name from teacher_info a left outer join department_info b on a.ti_di_seq = b.di_seq where ti_seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: update teacher_info set ti_di_seq = #{ti_di_seq}, ti_name = #{ti_name}, ti_number = #{ti_number}, ti_birth = #{ti_birth}, ti_phone_num = #{ti_phone_num}, ti_email = #{ti_email}, ti_status = #{ti_status}, ti_mod_dt = NOW() where ti_seq = #{ti_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teacher_info_history (tih_ti_seq, tih_type, tih_content) VALUES (#{tih_ti_seq}, #{tih_type}, #{tih_content})
mapper.select: select ti_seq from teacher_info order by ti_seq desc limit 1
